subject: Re: Diode EVP Capture Device I built
author: Jeff
full_text:
Thanks for the info on the diodes, Mike. They looked rather unusual 
in the pics, so I was curious. I see from their datasheets that they 
are zener diodes - which was a surprise.
A curious arrangement youve got for the circuit - certainly a radical 
departure from the traditional Raudive diode detector design.
I think youre onto something with this application... Great discovery.
I'll spend some more time with your file, and see if I can hear any 
other segments.
regards,
JEFF
--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "M.A. Coletta (Mike)" 
<michaelcoletta@...> wrote:
>
> Hi Jeff,
> 
> Thanks for sharing...
> The diodes are:
> Two in the plug tip circuit - 1N3020
> Two in he plug shield circuit - 1N3023
> 
> - Mike (UFO Geek)
> My Spiricomp ITC Systems configurations:
> http://www.ufogeek.com/spiricomp/spiricompsystems.JPG
> 
>
